name: Easy VTT
description:
NOTE: Paid Edition is required to host lobbies. Free Edition can only join lobbies.

It's in the name, Easy. The easiest to use VTT, and we mean it.

Grid System

Unique and Easy scaling grid system -- scale your map to any grid size!
The grid scales to a maximum of 120x120 for 14,400 tiles.
Upload your custom maps or any images of your choice.

Fog of War

Easy to apply, drag and drop, Fog of War system.

Selection

Drag box selection with copy and paste!
Select multiple tokens, adjust color, size, images, rotation, and much more.

Saving

Upload your entire collection of 2D tokens into a 3D world!
Save and Load your tables, including tokens and FX, at the click of a button!
The file system supports map images up to 100MB in file size.

Setting up your table has never been so Easy!
